EXTRACTED VALUE: Summarizing, Assassin’s Creed had so much potential, but seems to have out thought itself.
The ultimate racing game for fans of slowburning, ultra detailed motoring... a bit joyless for everyone else. [Aug 2007, p.78]
It shows what the console can do by looking absolutely gorgeous where some other games have failed miserably to do so.
The best Dead or Alive game so far. The single player is weak so avoid paying full price if you don’t have a friend to player or access to Xbox Live.
